The list of substances covered by point (a) is available by consulting the ‘Candidate List of
substances of very high concern for Authorisation’ managed by the European Chemicals Agency
(ECHA), pursuant to Article 59 (10) of the REACH Regulation.
The list of substances covered by point (b) is available by consulting the table of harmonised
entries in Annex VI to CLP, containing all updates3 to the harmonised classification and labelling
